description: buildings and ruined walls at right; water at left, with several small boats and sailboats in middle ground; some rowers on two boats, LLC; figures around ruined wall at bottom center and right; other figures sitting in shade under awning against building in middle ground, right; tall tower on peninsula at left
inscription:

bottom center, in pencil: [Ptg (?) 67]; right edge, center, in pencil: illegible inscription; LRC and on back, in pencil: [1098]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1996; sold in August for KOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1996-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC below image, in the plate: [J.J. DB. 1807]
title: Vue de l'ancienne Douane de Rome
